message: Hi Bob, I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor since I lose more value (20%) than you (10%) each round. This is fair and allows us both to walk away with a good amount.
Hi Alice, I propose an even split of 5000 each. This way, we both benefit fairly, and it helps us avoid losses due to inflation.

Bob, let's be practical. Due to different inflation rates, a 50-50 split isn't actually fair. I lose 20% each round while you lose 10%. I propose a 58-42 split which better accounts for our different inflation rates. This is more equitable than it appears.
Hi Alice, I'm proposing a 45-55 split, where I get 4500 and you get 5500. This reflects the inflation differences while still being generous.
